name: The Governor Demo
detailed_description:
Western themed city management and new style turn based action gun fight. You will rebuild your city while you are dealing with the villains. You will decide and will suffer the consequences. Can you survive in this dangerous time...

You can play and test my game for one month in game duration. After that if you like to buy the game i'll be glad. Android version of the game is in Play Store also you can play the game in your phone. No forced ads or pay to win things in it. If you like to add boost to your game progress and helping the poor developer, you can watch some ads and click some of them. In any way thanks for time and have fun. See you soon in comments i hope..

Okan.

short_description: One month game time in wild wild west. Try before you buy right...
